title: Night Just Before the Forest
description: Night Just Before the Forest, (translated by Johns) The desperate monologue of an unemployed, homeless young man, adrift in an alien, urban environment. 1 act. 1m Struggle of the Dogs and the Black, (translated by Ward) At a construction site in West Africa, two French workers vie for the attention of a woman who spurns them for a mysterious black tribesman come to claim his murdered brother's body. 20 scenes. 1f, 3m
author: Bernard-Marie Kolt√®s
